channel.title: Implementation of StringBuilders :: Data Structures in C#
channel.description: Implementation of StringBuilders In this section, we will examine some of the implementation details of the StringBuilder class. There are several reasons for doing this. First, by examining these details, we can begin to understand why a StringBuilder is so much more efficient than a string when it comes to building long strings a character at a time. Second, by studying implementations of data structures, we can learn techniques that might be useful to us if we need to build our own data structures.
